label: 1000 Handed
description: This creature can project a plethora of ethereal limbs, allowing it to finely manipulate objects at a significant distance, and even attack with them.

label: 2 Headed
description: This creature possesses two heads.

label: 3 Headed
description: This creature possesses three heads.

label: Ace
description: Ace creatures are generally PCs and PC grade creatures. Can be used for bosses, story significant entities, first partner creature etc. Awards more skill points at character creation and possibly other effects.

label: Aero Sense
description: This creature is capable of feeling vibrations through the air.

label: Alolan
description: Denotes if the creature originates from the Alola Region. For [Pokemon], it denotes Regional Variants.

label: Amorphous
description: The creature in question has no fixed shape.

label: Aura User
description: This creature is capable of utilising Aura powers beyond the norm. Potentially broadens the use of the Aura Sense skill. Gates Aura type perks.

label: Aura
description: Specifies effects that interact with the Aura Phenomenon in some way.

label: Awkward Flyer
description: This creature can fly. Kind of. Just not well.

label: Awkward Swimmer
description: This creature can swim. Kind of. Just not well.

label: Baby
description: This creature is appears to resemble a human infant. Usually associated with lower statistics and skills.

label: Bait
description: Provides a bonus to Track skill checks when used as bait. Need to work out values. Bait X?

label: Berry Production
description: This creature produces berries that can be used as a consumable.

label: Bipedal
description: The creature walks on two limbs, standing mostly upright.

label: Black Hole
description: This creature can absorb things into themselves.

label: Bladed
description: This creature possesses effective edged limbs, body parts, or tools. Confers [Sharp] to [Adaptable] actions.

label: Blindsight X
description: This creature is blind and can use Listen in place of Spot Hidden. Otherwise continued capable of "seeing" in it's vicinity, which is Xm.

label: Blindsight 15
description: This creature is blind and can use Listen in place of Spot Hidden. Otherwise continued capable of "seeing" in it's vicinity, which is 15m.

label: Breathless
description: This creature does not need to breathe.

label: Burrower
description: This creature has Burrow as Primary Movement Type.

label: Calming
description: This creature has the ability to calm others around it.

label: Chiller
description: This creature is very cooling, preventing Heat Exposure. Could make Cold Exposure worse.

label: Cloud Surf
description: This creature can use clouds to surf on as a means of flying.

label: Construct Commander
description: This creature is capable of commanding and controlling constructs which it has created even if they belong to a different trainer.

label: Construct
description: This creature was created through artificial means.

label: Creature
description: Indicates an creature is a creature.

label: Curse
description: This creature can lay curses on others.

label: Damp Flyer
description: This creature can't fly when wet.

label: Darkvision 15
description: This creature can see in the dark, up to 15m.

label: Darkvision
description: This creature can see in the dark, up to Xm.

label: Deafening
description: This creature is capable of being extremely loud to the point of causing temporary hearing loss to others.

label: Deep Breath
description: This creature can hold its breath for extended periods of time.

label: Deep Diver
description: This creature can withstand the pressure of the deep sea.

label: Delectable
description: This creature is considered particularly desirable as a foodstuff, or as a specific delicacy.

label: Delta Evolution
description: Rayquaza is capable of Mega Evolution when certain conditions are met, without needing to hold a Mega Stone. Rayquaza can use "Mega Evolve!" as a Free Action Interrupt upon resolving Dragon Ascent, or as a Simple Action with Dragon Ascent in its Active List. Unlike other creatures, Rayquaza does not require a partner with a Key Stone to use Mega Evolve, only requiring Dragon Ascent.

label: Digitize
description: The creature is able to become digital and enter cyberspace.

label: Direction Sense
description: This creature inherently knows it's location, either through innately knowing Magnetic North, some manner of clairvoyance, or some other physical or supernatural means. Provides a bonus to navigation of some sort.

label: Disaster Predictor
description: This creature can predict when disasters are going to occur.

label: Dream Eater
description: This creature can eat dreams and has other specific interactions with dreams.

label: Em Sense 15
description: This creature is capable of detecting electro-magnetic anomalies. It can detect minute anomalies within 15m of itself, and "see" magnetic fields and objects in that range as a creature would see something with eyes.

label: Em Sense X
description: This creature is capable of detecting electro-magnetic anomalies. It can detect minute anomalies within Xm of itself, and "see" magnetic fields and objects in that range as a creature would see something with eyes.

label: Emotion Eraser
description: This creature is capable of removing others' ability to feel emotions.

label: Fermenter
description: This creature can ferment berries.

label: Forme Change
description: This creature is capable of changing Formes. Most creatures have specific Triggers, listed in Traits or Abilities. Sometimes, this requires to overriding of the user's species with a Temporary Species.

label: Fossil
description: Indicates this creature was revived from a fossil.

label: Fruit Production
description: This creature produces fruit that can be used as a consumable.

label: Fully Evolved
description: Indicates a fully evolved creature.

label: Galarian
description: Denotes if the creature originates from the Galar Region. For [Pokemon], it denotes Regional Variants.

label: Gestalt
description: Refers to creatures that are multiple bodies sharing one mind.

label: Gilled
description: This creature is able to breathe underwater.

label: Glow
description: This creature illuminates an area. The particulars vary from instance to instance.

label: Grotesque Fusion
description: As an Exploration or Downtime Action, the user can choose to expel an absorbed Reshiram or Zekrom from its body, changing to its normal Forme. This can also be accomplished the use of an external mechanical (such as the DNA Splicers Item) or magical method applied to the user as part of an Exploration or Downtime Action.

label: Heater
description: This creature emits heat, preventing Cold Exposure. Can potentially make Heat Exposure worse.

label: Herb Grower
description: Maybe should be rolled into Sprouter/Plant Growth

label: Hollow Husk
description: Through the use of an external mechanical (such as the DNA Splicers Item) or magical method as part of an Exploration or Downtime Action on the user, the user can absorb a Reshiram or Zekrom into its body, equipped the creature as a [Belt] item, and changes the user's Forme to White or Black.

label: Honey Gather
description: This creature is very adept at gathering Honey, and gets an automatic degree of success on survival checks to find Honey, even in the event of failure.

label: Hopper
description: This creature has no legs, and must hop.

label: Horned
description: This creature possesses a prominent horn or spike. Confers [Horn] to [Adaptable] actions.

label: Hover
description: This creature naturally floats. Does not crash if it's deliberate flight is interrupted.

label: Human
description: Indicates an creature is Human, locks any human-only perks.

label: Ice Controller
description: This creature can control and form ice.

label: Illusionary Sorceror
description: This creature is capable of creating illusions, affecting the user's surroundings and creatures' higher senses.

label: Illusionist
description: This creature is capable of creating illusions.

label: Incarnate
description: This creature is in a harnessed, humanoid Forme, conferring intelligence and restraint on their powers. The use of a Reveal Glass transforms this creature into its [Therian] Forme.

label: Incubator
description: This creature is able to advance an egg's clock by two segments instead of one per interval.

label: Inflatable
description: This creature is capable of increasing its Size.

label: Interdimensional
description: This creature is capable of interdimensional travel.

label: Invisibility
description: This creature is capable of turning themselves invisible. They cannot be found using the Spot Hidden skill, but Listen may still work. Any hostile action negates Invisibility.

label: Ir Vision 15
description: This creature can see in the infrared spectrum, can perceive heat, from 15m away.

label: Ir Vision X
description: This creature can see in the infrared spectrum, can perceive heat, from Xm away.

label: Jet
description: This trait identifies an exceptionally fast flyer or swimmer

label: Legendary
description: Indicates this creature is a Legendary creature.

label: Legless
description: Like hopper but more slithery?

label: Lifesense X
description: This creature is capable of detecting living creatures within a Xm radius.

label: Lifesense 15
description: This creature is capable of detecting living creatures within a 15m radius.

label: Light Sensitive
description: May become dazzled and suffer penalties when exposed to bright light.

label: Living Weapon
description: This creature is capable of being wielded as if it were a weapon. Creatures with this trait grant the wielder a move based on their type, as well as affect the wielder's Struggle and Fling attacks.

label: Lumbering
description: This creature has a movement speed that is slower than normal for their characteristics.

label: Magnetic
description: This creature is magnetised in some way. Not sure on mechanics beyond that.

label: Many Legged
description: Literally just means the creature has a lot of legs.

label: Massive Weight
description: This creature is really heavy.

label: Medium
description: Aura-adjacent trait. Allows the creature to communicate with the dead. Does not cover Ghost-Type creature.

label: Memory Eraser
description: This creature is capable of erasing others' memories.

label: Milk Production
description: This creature produces Milk that can be used as a consumable.

label: Mimic
description: This creature is capable of mimicking human speech and other creature's cries.

label: Mind Control
description: This creature can influence or control others' minds.

label: Mind Lock
description: This creature's thoughts are unable to be accessed by Psychic entities.

label: Mind Reader
description: This creature can sense thoughts or feelings.

label: Mindlock
description: This creature's thoughts are unable to be accessed by Psychic entities.

label: Mindreader
description: This creature can sense thoughts or feelings.

label: Monoped
description: This creature has one leg.

label: Mud Runner
description: Is not impaired by muddy terrain.

label: Mushroom Harvest
description: ...Harvests mushrooms? Particulars pending really.

label: Natural Backpack
description: Creature with a natural storage pouch for transporting gear.

label: Nightmare Eraser
description: This creature has the power to dispel nightmares.

label: Nothing About Him Being A Mushroom Harvester Specifically But Maybe Have A Trait To Help The Trainer Find Natural Resources Maybe
Original One
description: This creature is capable of incredibly powerful feats such as bringing back things that it once destroyed, making certain things vanish into thin air, halting time, splitting itself in two, and overturning the very laws of nature. The user may use its Science (All) skill in place of any other Skill.

label: Pack Leader
description: A trait that will be acquired via perks. Will allow to coordinate Packs more effectively.

label: Pack Mon
description: Serves as a trigger trait for Pack perks and mechanics.

label: Paldean
description: Denotes if the creature originates from the Paldea Region. For [Pokemon], it denotes Regional Variants.

label: Paradox Sense
description: This creature can naturally sense the presence of Paradoxes.

label: Paradox
description: A trait used to identify Paradox creature and similar entities.

label: Pearl Creation
description: The creature produces Pearl treasure.

label: Perspective Swap
description: This creature is capable of swapping the perspectives of people and creature.

label: Phasing
description: This creature is capable of moving through physical barriers. Psychic and magical barriers should probably prevent it.

label: Phoenix
description: This creature can only be killed temporarily. Will revive naturally after a while.

label: Plant Wilter
description: This creature is capable of wilting plants.

label: Pokebot
description: Relates to the Pokebot template (pending creation)

label: Possession
description: This creature is capable of possessing the bodies of other creatures. how does this work?

label: Premonition
description: This creature can glimpse the future. Specifics pending.

label: Projectile
description: This creature is well-suited to being used as a projectile.

label: Rapid
description: Bipeds with Rapid are as fast as Quadrupeds.

label: Reach
description: With the help of gangly limbs, longer appendages, or vines and the like, the user has a longer reach. The user's Physical Reach is doubled.

label: Semi Invisible
description: This creature has some type of bonus to stealth checks but can still be spotted using Spot Hidden, unlike Invisibility.

label: Serpentine
description: This creature has a snake-like body.

label: Shadow Purification
description: Pending mechanics

label: Shapeshifter
description: Capable of changing shape to look like other things.

label: Shrinkable
description: This creature is able to reduce their size.

label: Silent
description: This creature is capable of moving without making a sound and cannot be detected by Listen if they do not wish to be.

label: Sky Forme
description: Depending on Weather conditions, the user may assume their Sky Forme.

label: Speech
description: This creature is capable of coherent speech. Can be awarded to PCs with the [creature] trait in games that include Human characters.

label: Spirit Traveler
description: This creature is capable of turning into a spirit and temporarily leaving its body.

label: Split Evolution
description: Indicates this creature can evolve into more than one option.

label: Stealth
description: Not sure this tag should exist really.

label: Steel Officer
description: Leadership checks made to influence this creature suffer -20 for creatures with the [Steel Pawn] trait, and +30 for creatures with the [Steel Shogun] Trait.

label: Steel Pawn
description: Leadership checks made to influence this creature gain +20 for creatures with the [Steel Officer] trait, and +50 for creatures with the [Steel Shogun] Trait.

label: Steel Shogun
description: This creature cannot be targeted by Leadership checks from creatures with the [Steel Pawn] and [Steel Officer] traits.

label: Sticky Hold
description: This feels like it should still just be the purview of the ability.

label: Stormcaller
description: This creature can create stormy conditions (not necessarily Rain without a move.)

label: Telekinetic
description: This creature is able to use the Lift skill telekinetically at range X / This creature can use Occult (Psychics) in place of the Lift skill.

label: Telepath
description: This creature is able to communicate telepathically, and read surface thoughts of creatures that lack the [Mindlock] trait.

label: Teleport
description: Pertaining to Moves and actions that involve Teleportation.

label: Teleporter
description: This creature is capable of teleportation based movement.

label: Therian
description: This creature is in a unbound, bestial Forme. This removes the restraints on the user's powers, and engaging in combat may drive the creature into a furious rampage. The use of a Reveal Glass transforms this creature into its [Therian] Forme.

label: Time Controller
description: This creature is capable of controlling time.

label: Time Traveller
description: This creature can time-travel. This is a powerful narrative ability and needs to be well regulated.

label: Tox Cleanse
description: This creature is capable of removing pollution and poisons out of the natural environment and creatures living there over the course of a Span whilst camping.

label: Toxic Skin
description: This creature's skin secretes a substance that has dangerous properties

label: Tracker
description: This creature is a naturally skilled tracker. Need to figure out mechanical bonuses to this effect.

label: Tremorsense 15
description: Able to detect the presence of creatures based on their movement when in contact with the ground and solid surfaces, up to 15m.

label: Tremorsense X
description: Able to detect the presence of creatures based on their movement when in contact with the ground and solid surfaces, up to Xm.

label: Tripod
description: This creature has three legs.

label: Truth Reflect
description: This creature is capable of showing the truth in its reflection after being polished.

label: Ultra
description: A trait used to identify Ultra Beasts and other entities (like humans) originating from Ultra Space.

label: Underdog
description: An creature with lower base stats, making them eligible for Underdog perks.

label: Unown Choir
description: The Unown are able to do a lot of weird shit when they sing together.

label: Volatile Bomb
description: This creature is known to explode voluntarily (via modes such as Self-Destruct) and does not suffer lasting effects from being fainted by such Moves (such as not becoming Weary)

label: Wallclimber
description: This creature may use their overland speed along walls, and may hang in place. Climb checks may be required if under duress.

label: Water Locator
description: This creature is capable of locating clean water.

label: Water Purity
description: This creature can naturally purify water on contact.

label: Water Storage
description: This creature can store water inside of themselves.

label: Wavesense 15
description: Able to detect the presence of creatures based on their movement when submerged partially or fully in the same body of water another fluid, up to 15m.

label: Wavesense X
description: Able to detect the presence of creatures based on their movement when submerged partially or fully in the same body of water another fluid, up to Xm.

label: Weapon Training
description: This creature is trained in the use of human-made weaponry.

label: Weapon
description: This trait applies to weapons and weapon-interactive moves.

label: Weathervane
description: Castform's trait. Has it change Forme depending on the most recent Tier 1+ [Weather], changing <Type> and granting the appropriate <Adaptable Type> Trait.

label: Wielder
description: This creature receives a Wielded/Held Item slot for free.

label: Willpower Eraser
description: This creature is capable of removing others' willpower to do anything.

label: Winged
description: This creature gains a flying speed by way of wings, requiring exertion to continue flight.

label: X Headed
description: Lists the number of heads the creature possesses, equal to X.

label: X Ray Vision
description: This creature can see through walls.

label: Tera Power
description: This creature emanates Terastal Energy, able to direct it toward other creatures or siphon it away from its surroundings into itself. This creature, through great strain, can induce Terastallization in [Pokemon].

label: Stellar
description: This creature may assume a heightened Forme when exposed to a Tera Orb, causing it to bristle with Stellar power. While in Stellar Forme, the user's control of Terastal Energy expands and is refined. The user may manipulate Terastal Energy to deactivate other creatures' Terastallization and even create physical constructs with it, such as walls and barriers.

label: Creepy Crawly
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Bug-Type.

label: Evil Touch
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Dark-Type.

label: Drakelike
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Dragon-Type.

label: Zapper
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Electric-Type

label: Sparkler
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Fairy-Type

label: Well Built
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Fighting-Type

label: Firestarter
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Fire-Type

label: Guster
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Flying-Type.

label: Spooky
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Ghost-Type.

label: Floratic
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Grass-Type.

label: Fictile
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Ground-Type.

label: Freezer
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Ice-Type

label: Generalizer
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Normal-Type.

label: Emitter
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Nuclear-Type.

label: Venomous
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Poison-Type.

label: Psycher
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Psychic-Type.

label: Lithic
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Rock-Type.

label: Malevolent
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Shadow-Type.

label: Natural Steel
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Steel-Type

label: Fountain
description: Allows the user to Type-Shift [Adaptable] actions and attacks to the Water-Type

label: Stack X
description: Denotes the number of stacks

label: Belt
description: Denotes an item stored in the Belt equipment slot.

label: Fling
description: Denotes if an item can be used as part of the Fling attack action.

label: X Strike
description: Denotes if an action hits multiple times. Attacks with X<5 rolls the attack (Accuracy and Damage) X times against up to X targets of the user's choice, with on-hit and resolution effects proccing each time. Attacks with X>5 rolls the Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d(X-1), damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: 2 Strike
description: Rolls the attack (Accuracy and Damage) 2 times against up to 2 targets of the user's choice, with on-hit and resolution effects proccing each time.

label: 3 Strike
description: Rolls the attack (Accuracy and Damage) 3 times against up to 3 targets of the user's choice, with on-hit and resolution effects proccing each time.

label: 5 Strike
description: Rolls the attack's Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d4. damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: 10 Strike
description: Rolls the attack's Accuracy check against one target, then multiplies the Base Power of the attack by 1+d9. damaging the target with that changed Power, and inflicting on-hit and resolution effects once.

label: Adaptable
description: Means that an attack or action can be Type-Shifted based on other Traits.

label: Arcane
description: Denotes magical actions.

label: Basic
description: Means than an attack or action is simple/reliable, generally associated with a low PP Cost.

label: Blast X
description: Utilized with ranged attacks and effects. Affects entities within a X.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 1
description: Affects entities within a 1.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 2
description: Affects entities within a 2.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 3
description: Affects entities within a 3.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 4
description: Affects entities within a 4.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 5
description: Affects entities within a 5.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 6
description: Affects entities within a 6.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 7
description: Affects entities within a 7.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Blast 8
description: Affects entities within a 8.5m radius circle/sphere, centered on a selected space.

label: Bone
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes a bone or ossified item or appendage.

label: Contact
description: Denotes if a creature makes contract with its target through using the associated action or attack.

label: Crash 1 2
description: On miss, the user takes damage equal to half the amount the attack would have dealt to the target.

label: Crit 1
description: User's CRIT stage is considered to be +1 higher when using the associated action or attack.

label: Crit 2
description: User's CRIT stage is considered to be +2 higher when using the associated action or attack.

label: Crit 4
description: User's CRIT stage is considered to be +4 higher when using the associated action or attack.

label: Crushing
description: The associated action/attack deals double damage to and have +20 Accuracy against creatures that are Shrinked, or creatures with a CatMod that are 3 or more lower than the user.

label: Curl
description: Denotes actions/attacks that require the user to curl their body into a ball or another round shape.

label: Dance
description: Denotes actions/attacks that utilize dancing.

label: Danger Close
description: These attacks bypass the Accuracy Check within the first Range Increment, and start at 100 Accuracy from the second Band onward.

label: Dash
description: Declaring these attacks allow the user to freely use Rush, but cannot be used if the user is Bound.

label: Defensive
description: Denotes a defensive attack/ability.

label: Defrost
description: Declaring these attacks reduces the user's Frostbitten and Frozen Stacks by 2 and 1 respectively.

label: Drain X
description: On hit, the user heals X of the amount the attack deals to a creature. X is usually a fraction.

label: Drain 1 16
description: On hit, the user heals 1/16 of the amount the attack deals to a creature.

label: Drain 1 4
description: On hit, the user heals 1/4 of the amount the attack deals to a creature.

label: Drain 1 3
description: On hit, the user heals 1/3 of the amount the attack deals to a creature.

label: Drain 1 2
description: On hit, the user heals 1/2 of the amount the attack deals to a creature.

label: Drain 3 4
description: On hit, the user heals 3/4 of the amount the attack deals to a creature.

label: Draw In
description: The attack/ability draws in other attacks and abilities within a specific range or meeting specific criteria

label: Earthbound
description: Hits all creatures in area of attack, so long as the area-of-effect affects surfaces/objects are connected or touching, so a creature sitting on a tree branch is hit if a creature on the ground below is targeted and the tree itself is in the affected area.

label: Environ
description: Denotes if an attack/ability is affected by or interacts with [Weather] or [Terrain] effects.

label: Execute
description: On hit, an affected creature has their HP reduced to zero.

label: Exhaust
description: This attack consumes a Simple Action on the user's next activation.

label: Explode
description: Denotes if an attack/ability consists of an explosion of some kind.

label: Field
description: Denotes if an attack has a particular use out of combat.

label: Friendly
description: These actions and attacks do not affect allied creatures in range.

label: Hazard
description: Denotes if an attack/ability/effect creates or interacts with Hazards. Hazards are usually static objects occupying a single space on the ground or another surface that cause detrimental effects when a creature passes through that space.

label: Healing
description: Denotes if an attack/ability/effect interacts with healing the user or others.

label: Horn
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes a horn or a similar prominent pointy appendage.

label: Jaw
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes the user's mouth/teeth.

label: Kick
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes at least one of the user's feet.

label: Linked
description: Denotes if an attack is linked to the use of another.

label: Mascot
description: Denotes powerful or useful attacks/abilities, generally only obtainable by a creature that has obtained a strong bond with comrades, a mentor, and/or a Trainer.

label: Max
description: These attacks deal 1/4 of the damage they would deal if they are negated by a [Shield] effect and apply their secondary effects. These attacks also possess [Danger Close] and [Smite]. These attacks may only be used while Dynamaxed/Gigantimaxed/Eternamaxed.

label: Melee
description: Denotes attacks utilized by Melee Weapons. These attacks also possess [Contact].

label: Missile
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes a discrete, high-speed projectile.

label: Move Locked
description: Denotes if an attack is species-exclusive.

label: Pass X
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to X creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 1
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 1 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 2
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 2 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 3
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 3 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 4
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 4 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 5
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 5 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 6
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 6 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 7
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 7 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pass 12
description: This attack allows the creature to move through enemy squares as part of their Movement and attack those creatures. They can attack up to 12 creatures, declaring and resolving the attack on each. Each attack beyond the first costs 1 PP.

label: Pledge
description: Denotes a special pledge attack, which increases in intensity and may produce a [Pledge Combo] when used in tandem with another pledge attack.

label: Pledge Combo
description: Denotes a special combination attack, triggering from the combined use of a specific pairing of [Pledge] attacks.

label: Powder
description: Denotes if an attack or ability spreads or uses powder or a fine dust.

label: Pulse
description: Denotes if an attack or ability expels a wave of energy.

label: Punch
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes at least one of the user's hands.

label: Push X
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures Xm away from the user.

label: Push 1
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 1m away from the user.

label: Push 2
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 2m away from the user.

label: Push 3
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 3m away from the user.

label: Push 4
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 4m away from the user.

label: Push 5
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 5m away from the user.

label: Push 6
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 6m away from the user.

label: Push 12
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 12m away from the user.

label: Push 15
description: On hit, the attack pushes creatures 15m away from the user.

label: Push
description: Denotes if the attack has a secondary [Push X] effect, usually variable or condition-dependent.

label: Ranged
description: Denotes attacks utilized by Ranged Weapons.

label: Ray
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes a precise beam of energy.

label: Recoil X
description: On hit, the user takes damage equal to X of the amount the attack deals to a creature. X is usually a fraction.

label: Recoil 1 8
description: On hit, the user takes damage equal to 1/8 of the amount the attack deals to a creature.

label: Recoil 1 4
description: On hit, the user takes damage equal to 1/4 of the amount the attack deals to a creature.

label: Recoil 1 3
description: On hit, the user takes damage equal to 1/3 of the amount the attack deals to a creature.

label: Recoil 1 2
description: On hit, the user takes damage equal to 1/2 of the amount the attack deals to a creature.

label: Self Ko
description: After attack resolution, the user has their HP reduced to zero.

label: Set Up
description: The action has a two-step activation and resolution, split across two activations (Set-Up and Resolution) and consumes Complex Actions on both Activations, but PP only once. It may have separate effects on both the set up activation and resolution activation, though usually the attack's accuracy and damage roll occur on the resolution activation.

label: Sharp
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes a sharp, edged limb or weapon.

label: Shield
description: Denotes if an attack/ability/effect provides a shielding function.

label: Sky
description: The attack's area of effect extends vertically, up to the nearest ceiling and down to the nearest surface (max 20m each direction)

label: Smite
description: When this attack misses a creature, it deals damage to the target as if it was resisted one step further, and doesn't activate any of its on hit effects.

label: Social
description: Denotes if an attack or ability features social interaction.

label: Sonic
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes sound.

label: Tail
description: Denotes if an attack or ability utilizes a tail or a similar lengthy appendage.

label: Terrain
description: Denotes if an attack/ability/effect interacts with Terrains.

label: Transform
description: Denotes if an attack/ability/effect Transforms the user.

label: Trap
description: Denotes if an attack/ability/effect traps creatures, usually via the Bound or Stuck conditions.

label: Unreliable
description: This attack's Accuracy is equal to 30+User Level-Target Level, and is unmodified by and ignores all other changes to actions' Accuracy or the target's Evasion.

label: Weather
description: Denotes if an attack/ability/effect interacts with Weathers.

label: Wind
description: Denotes if an attack or ability interacts with or utilizes Wind.

label: Zenith
description: These attacks deal 1/4 of the damage they would deal if they are negated by a [Shield] effect.

label: Switch Grip
description: One-handed: can hold item in one hand, and another held item in the other hand. Two-handed: power of weapon attacks +30%, loses second held item slot

label: Reload
description: These weapons can only use their innate PP Pool for their attacks. The user can use a Simple Action to reload the weapon, refilling its PP Pool. This Action either consumes an Ammunition item relating to the weapon, or consumes the Character's IP at an increased cost.

label: Pokemon
description:
This is a Pokemon, it does Pokemon things...

[Fully Evolved]

label: EM Sense
description: n/a

label: Lifesense
description: n/a

label: Awkward Flier
description: n/a

label: Blindsight
description: n/a
